Hi Bjarne,

Thanks for your time.

Are you saying that RejectDecideRule actually
dis-allow DNS-lookup and fetching robots.txt?

If I put PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule right after
RejctDecideRule, the *only* effect will be allowing
Heritrix to do DNS-lookup and fetching robots.txt?

Thanks in advance.

Cheers,
Hei
--- Bjarne Andersen <bja@...> wrote:

> You can't crawl anything if not allowing DNS-lookup
> and fetching of robots.txt. This is exactly what
> PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule does.
> 
> best
> -- 
> Bjarne Andersen
> Daily Manager - netarchive.dk
> 
> State & University Library

> mbarlotta wrote:
> >>>Oops forgot to provide more info about my
> setting:
> >>>DecidingScope:
> >>>- RejectDecideRule()
> >>>-
>
OnDomainsDecideRule(decision=Accept,seeds-as-surt-prefixes=true)
> >>>
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > I am sure someone can give a reason for why this
> is needed but try 
> > adding this decide rule to the end of your chain: 
> > PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule
> > 
> > It worked for me...
> > 
> > Mike
> >
